::Spears::

She stood there, looking at Tamron. "My name is Spears."
She turned and looked at Striker.  She felt her programs being over 
ridden by the chip.  But part of her was still trying to fight it. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> (Cool. I'll rewrite my post. The part about Savage attacking 
Striker 
> is still valid, same with the shots hitting Tamron, but the whole 
> Iguana thing, the chip being defelcting and Tamron's little speech 
I 
> am re-writing. I think I might like this story-line, though. 
Striker 
> could go through hell trying to get Spears' back, and Savage hates 
> Striker so eventually they could have a climactic battle. Who wins? 
> We'll have to play it out.)
> 
> Tamron
> 
> Tamron watched as the micro-chip sinks into Spears. He lets out a 
> good laugh.
> 
> "Hahahahaha! Hold your fire, or your friend is done for. I have the 
> power now to even force herself to self-destruct. Now, you, what is 
> your name?"
